items.title: Netflix is showing Hollywood what happens when a startup grows up
items.creator: Theresa Loconsolo
items.summary: 无法生成摘要（API请求失败）。
items.translated_title: Netflix is showing Hollywood what happens when a startup grows up
items.content: A baby was born in a Waymo this week, and it wasn’t even the first one.  What started as a novelty story quickly became a reminder of how autonomous vehicles have quietly become part of everyday life, complete with all the messiness that entails. The real coming-of-age story this week, however, wasn’t happening in San Francisco’s robotaxis. It was playing out in […]
